derivation: from H6473 (פָּעַר); a gap; also H1187 (בַּעַל פְּעוֹר))
outline:
Peor = "cleft"
  1. a mountain peak in Moab belonging to the Abarim range and near Pisgah
  2. a false god worshipped in Moab; corresponds to Baal
strongs_def: Peor, a mountain East of Jordan; Baal Peor,  (for a deity worshipped there
